ollama.description: Local Ollama - RECOMMENDED for policy privacy

_comments.why_local: Policy documents may contain sensitive government data. Local models (Ollama) ensure data never leaves your machine - critical for pre-publication policy testing.
_comments.how_to_switch: Set 'llm_provider' to 'ollama', 'openai', 'gemini', or 'blaxel'. Then fill in the API key for your chosen provider.
_comments.security: Never commit this file with API keys. Add to .gitignore if sharing code.
